titles.title: Hear my cry, hear my cry, O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear my cry, hear my cry, O Lord
Attend unto my prayer
Attend unto my prayer
From the ends of the earth
Will I cry unto thee
When my heart is overwhelmed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lead me to the Rock
Lead me to the Rock
Lead me to the Rock
That is higher than I
